entry.title: Link Octopress to Sina Weibo
entry.content:
Brief Introduction

Let me describe this with simple words.
I want to Sina Weibo automaticly publish a tweet when I post a new blog on here.

Using Google Reader

  1. first of all, subscribe your blog with Google Reader. It will automatically find out RSS feed. if Not please enter http://yourdomain.com/atom.xml manually.

  2. Create a new folder/tag in your Subscription. You can simply press the drop-down label, at the right side of a subscription and choose “new folder…” in the below.

  3. once you created the folder/tag, click the drop-down label at the right, and choose “Create a bundle”

  4. Press save in the next dialog, it will shows as a list named “Your bundles”, Now our work are almost finish.

  5. Press “Add a link” to your website or blog - it opens a new window and shows your RSS feeds, Copy this address and paste that into Sina Weibo Blog Link Services page

  6. Done!

End

Now you can Post blog, it will automatically post a new tweet about your blog post.
